summary: In 1950s Trinidad, a frustrated writer supports himself as a masseur--and soon becomes a revered mystic and politico.
cast: Aasif Mandvi|Albert Laveau|Jimi Mistry|Sanjeev Bhaskar|Om Puri|Ayesha Dharker|Sakina Jaffrey|Zohra Sehgal|James Fox|Rez Kempton|Lisa Bissoon|Grace Maharaj|Ria Soodeen|Michael Jogee|Sunil Maharaj|Shiraz Mohammed|Anthony Harry Paulsingh|Rajendra Rastogi|Danesh Khan|Hanskumar Seecharan|Sanjeev Boodhu|Lystra Francis|Sara-Anne Chow-Quan|Eddie Yearwood|Patti-Anne Ali|Dinesh Maharaj|David Sammy|Royce Francis-Lau|Glenda Constantine Jobity|Nirad Tewarie|Risa Williams|Keith Hazare Imambaksh|Alfred McClatchie|Mitra Maharaj|Shastri Maharaj|Deborah Maillard|Wayne Shockness|Michael Cherrie|Maureen Thompson|Pip Torrens|Marie Kavangh|Edisson Baptiste|Francis Pau|Andre Comeau|Liana Jaye Williams|George 'Umbala' Joseph|Avery Seaton|Jonathon Ali|Ryan Ragoonath|Ravin Ramkissoon|Kelly Neese|Ben Spencer|Kieron Quirke
title: The Mystic Masseur
